thread.title: 3 Gorgeous Ladies We Spotted At The Geospa Asiaspa Awards, Last Night
thread.title_full: 3 Gorgeous Ladies We Spotted At The Geospa Asiaspa Awards, Last Night

title: 3 Gorgeous Ladies We Spotted At The Geospa Asiaspa Awards, Last Night
text:
facebook 154 SHARES 
A lot of awards shows are taking place these days and Bollywood celebs are making it a point to keep their best foot forward. Dazzling in some of the most stunning outfits, the stars are shining in their best. So, as hard as a choice it was, we picked three of the most beautiful ladies from last night who lit the red carpet! 1.Aditi Rao Hydari 
One of the most underrated fashionistas of Bollywood, Aditi came in a bronze gown with a plunging neckline. The look was finished with minimal make-up and a sleek ponytail, which is Aditiâ€™s go-to choice. 2.Rekha 
It is amazing how this lady manages to look like a dream every single time. The actress took a break from her regular golden-girl avatar, and picked up a multi-coloured banarasi sari. She maintained her regal self with some gorgeous jewellery and hair swept to one side. 3.Jacqueline Fernandez 
Taking the heat up a notch, the Housefull 3 actress went for a Catwoman-off-duty look, with a black shirt, a fringe detailed mesh skirt, finished with a choker. Picture Credits: Viral Bhayani
